revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Kyocera |model=KR2 |revision= |upc=674847025085 |ean= |asin=B0015VVXOK |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=01/30/2008 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=U-MEDIA |manuf_model=WRT-384U |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=OVFTXRTR10012 |ic_id=3572A-TXRTR10012 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ubicom |cpu1_model=IP5100U |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI,PCMCIA (32-bit),USB 2.0,ExpressCard/34 (USB) |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |expansion_expresscard_num=1 |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=U-MEDIA WMD-370L |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2860 |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2820 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8306S |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=3G capable |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Kyocera KR2-XXX |default_ssid_regex=^Kyocera KR2-[a-f0-9]{3}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:14:60 |oui_eth=00:14:60 |default_ch= }} [http://www.kyocera-wireless.com/kr2-router/user-guides.htm User guides]
The default SSID (per [http://manuals.solidsignal.com/KR2%20Quick%20Start%20Guide.pdf this quick start guide] and WiGLE) is '''Kyocera KR2-XXX''' where '''XXX''' is the last three hex digits of the wireless interface MAC address (capital letters). The password for the KR2 is apparently the last 6 characters of the KR2 MAC ID.
